QuestData.Title: Wrangle More Aether Rays!
QuestData.Description: So, I hope that you're up to helping us wrangle up even more aether rays! From what I can see, you're a natural with the rope! And it's for a good cause, because not only do we get fresh mounts, but it helps us to protect Ogri'la, which the ogres appreciate.$B$BRemember, the aether rays fly around Vortex Summit, and the Crystal Spine to the northeast.$B$BThink you can wrangle me up some more?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Wrangling Rope to capture 5 Aether Rays.
QuestData.CompletionText: You're doing great work for us, $n. I want you to know that we really appreciate everything that you're doing to keep us stocked up in fresh mounts!
QuestData.RewardText: You continue to amaze me! Tell you what... why don't you come back tomorrow and we'll let the rope cool off for now?$B$B<Khatie laughs.>$B$BThank you so much, $n!
